properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 3 at 8:09AM MST until February 4 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Grand Junction CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow...moderate to heavy at times...expected. Total snow
accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph
creating areas of blowing.

* WHERE...Eastern Uinta Basin.

* WHEN...Until midnight MST tonight.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing
snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially in open
areas. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or
evening commute. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found
at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT
